projects.name: Deck.gl Ecosystem
projects.description: A suite of composable visualization frameworks for high-performance web-based visualization

entries.name: kepler.gl
entries.description: kepler.gl is a widely used geospatial tool for interactive exploration of geospatial data using deck.gl.

entries.name: i3s-explorer
entries.description: A viewer for I3S (Indexed 3D Scene Layer) data built with deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl
entries.description: High-performance, GPU powered visualization layers for large scale geospatial data.

entries.name: pydeck
entries.description: Python bindings for deck.gl that enable custom geospatial visualizations.

entries.name: @kepler.gl
entries.description: The kepler.gl framework for building custom geospatial applications.

entries.name: hubble.gl
entries.description: Animation and video capture for deck.gl and kepler.gl visualizations.

entries.name: flowmap.gl
entries.description: A powerful flow map drawing layer for deck.gl. For visualization of geographic movement.

entries.name: graph-layers
entries.description: Graph visualization layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: editable-layers
entries.description: High-performance feature editing layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: arrow-layers
entries.description: Arrow visualization layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/leaflet
entries.description: Unofficial basemap add-on module for deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/bing-maps
entries.description: Unofficial basemap add-on module for deck.gl.

entries.name: react-map-gl
entries.description: React wrapper for Maplibre and Mapbox GL JS.

entries.name: react-google-maps
entries.description: React wrapper for Google Maps JavaScript API.

entries.name: luma.gl
entries.description: WebGPU and WebGL2 library for high-performance visualization.

entries.name: loaders.gl
entries.description: Framework-independent loaders for geospatial and 3D formats.

entries.name: math.gl
entries.description: Math library for 3D and geospatial calculations.

entries.name: probe.gl
entries.description: JavaScript instrumentation and testing utilities.

entries.name: mjolnir
entries.description: Event handling library for interactive visualizations.

entries.name: dev-tools
entries.description: Development tools for vis.gl frameworks.
